text: Hi guys, is there any way to change the logo of a header in 1 page only? I added css to change the colors and buttons of the headers but cant seem to figure how to overwrite an image

Hi <@U03BA1PRV7S> it is possible with <https://maka-agency-4740449.hs-sites.com/en/|POWER theme>. Header is set at global level, but can be swapped at page level, and also overridden at page level. So yes, it is possible :slightly_smiling_face:
